thread.title: U.S. government shutdown would affect military operations: Mattis

title: U.S. government shutdown would affect military operations: Mattis
text:
U.S. government shutdown would affect military operations: Mattis Friday, January 19, 2018 - 02:10 
U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis said that the U.S. military's competitive edge has eroded ''in every domain of warfare'' and blamed that partly on spending caps and congressional budget dysfunction. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
